attributes.action: Support an attack on Iran IF they don't back down both on their nuclear programme and on their funding for terrorism and attacks on our troops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst no one want's a war and all the pain and suffering involved with it we cannot sit back and allow the regime in Iran to gain nuclear weapons. IF peaceful means do not succeed over the next year or if they actually test a nuclear weapon sooner we must act. In addition they must understand that funding for terrorism and for attacking our troops should be seen as an act of war in itself that will have military consequences if it continues though such action in this latter case might be limited in nature.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
